text.div:
Search Parameter on related practitioner resources for security

Parameter related-practitioner:string

Search by related practitioner for a PractitionerRole resource.

ResourcePractitionerRole
ExpressionPractitionerRole.extension('http://ihris.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ihris-related-group').extension('practitioner')
Processing ModeNormal
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: Search Parameter on related practitioner resources for security
description: Search by related practitioner for a PractitionerRole resource.
